title: Gabriel's Inferno Trilogy
description:
From New York Times bestselling author Sylvain Reynard comes the haunting trilogy of one man's salvation and one woman's sensual awakening...The first three volumes in the story of Professor Gabriel Emerson and his beloved Julia, an unforgettable exploration of sin, seduction, forbidden love, and redemption.

GABRIEL'S INFERNOGABRIEL'S RAPTUREGABRIEL'S REDEMPTION
author: Sylvain Reynard
